name: The UnKnown house
description:
Average playtime: 10~15 minutes Demo Overview:  The unknown house is a thrilling horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. You play as a man who wakes up in a strange room, only to find himself trapped in an abandoned and haunted house. As you try to find a way out, you'll encounter all sorts of paranormal activity that will make your heart race. controls: wasd:movement E:interact

Features:

  • Immersive first-person gameplay
  • Creepy and unsettling atmosphere
  • Challenging puzzles to solve
